All the benchmarks seem slower. What happened?

My intuition is that ParseFromArray will only be faster for small payloads. I chose 1024 as a completely magic number. Maybe we can input from proto team as to when it makes more sense to start parsing from coded stream instead.
Closing in favor of what @yang-g is working on
